DataElement.preferredName: Prior Therapy Metastatic Neoplasm Administered Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The coded indicator response regarding whether a patient has received prior therapy for a metastatic neoplasm.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information related to the prior administration of a therapy (including surgery, radiotherapy, systemic therapy or hormonal therapies) for metastatic disease.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An indicator that a person has been previously treated for the same condition or with the same therapy.

Concepts.definition: Prior action or administration of therapeutic agents that produced an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

Property.preferredDefinition: A tumor that has spread from its original (primary) site of growth to another site, close to or distant from the primary site.  Metastasis is characteristic of advanced malignancies, but in rare instances can be seen in neoplasms lacking malignant morphology. -- 2004:The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

Concepts.definition: A tumor that has spread from its original (primary) site of growth to another site, close to or distant from the primary site.  Metastasis is characteristic of advanced malignancies, but in rare instances can be seen in neoplasms lacking malignant morphology.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.origin: NCCTG CRF:North Central Cancer Treatment Group Case Report Form
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from CTEP to Alliance for by script Fri Oct 25 15:25:44 EDT 2013

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has patient received prior th
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior therapies for metastatic disease?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received no more than two prior therapies for metastatic disease?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient been treated with at least one prior systemic treatment for incurable advanced or metastatic SCCA of the anal canal?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has received no more than two prior cytotoxic chemotherapies for metastatic CRPC disease?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received more than two prior systemic regimens for management of recurrent, persistent or metastatic carcinoma of the cervix?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received at least 1 prior line of systemic therapy, and received no more than 2 prior lines of therapy in the metastatic setting?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received no more than two prior lines of chemotherapy for advanced disease?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received more than 2 prior lines of chemotherapy in the metastatic setting?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 8
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient has received prior chemotherapy, patient received less than or equal to 3 lines of chemotherapy in the metastatic setting?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 9
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received at least one line of systemic therapy in the advanced/metastatic setting?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 10
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient has HER2+ breast cancer, has patient received 2 prior systemic lines of therapy, in the metastatic setting, including anti-HER2 therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 11
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received prior systemic therapy for extensive-stage, metastatic disease?
